attributes.action: Better wages for live in care
attributes.additional_details:
Make a law for us to receive 75 percent of the total cost of live in care cost.
We do 90 percent of the work.
attributes.background: 75 percent wages should go to the live in carer and 25 percent to the company who hire or give work to us

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for privately employed care staff are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum wage for care home workers to £15 an hour: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650156
